code: import React from'react';function useTimeout(callback,delay){var timeoutRef=React.useRef();var callbackRef=React.useRef(callback);React.useEffect(function(){callbackRef.current=callback;},[callback]);React.useEffect(function(){if(typeof delay==='number'){timeoutRef.current=window.setTimeout(function(){return callbackRef.current();},delay);return function(){return window.clearTimeout(timeoutRef.current);};}},[delay]);return timeoutRef;}export default useTimeout;
